    • Method Detail

      • doMacroUpdatesComplete

        protected void doMacroUpdatesComplete(boolean commandError)
        Perform the steps needed following execution of macro updates to the database
        Parameters:
        commandError - false if the database commands successfully completed; true if an error occurred and the changes were not made

      • storeCurrentData

        private void storeCurrentData()
        Copy the macro data so it can be used to determine if changes are made

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Create the macro editor dialog. This is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the telemetry scheduler initialization completes execution

      • getMacroReferences

        private CcddMacroEditorDialog.MacroReference getMacroReferences(java.lang.String macroName)
        Get the references to the specified macro in the tables
        Parameters:
        macroName - macro name
        Returns:
        Reference to the specified macro in the tables

      • createMacroTable

        private javax.swing.JScrollPane createMacroTable()
        Create the macro table
        Returns:
        Reference to the scroll pane in which the table is placed

      • windowCloseButtonAction

        protected void windowCloseButtonAction()
        Handle the dialog close button press event
        Overrides:
        windowCloseButtonAction in class CcddDialogHandler

      • expandMacros

        protected void expandMacros(boolean isExpand)
        Based on the input flag, display the macro values (names) in place of the macro names (values)
        Parameters:
        isExpand - true to replace the macro names with the corresponding macro values; false to restore the macro names

      • getUpdatedData

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getUpdatedData()
        Get the updated macro data
        Returns:
        List containing the updated macro data

      • checkForMissingColumns

        private boolean checkForMissingColumns()
        Check that a row with contains data in the required columns
        Returns:
        true if a row is missing data in a required column

      • buildUpdates

        private void buildUpdates()
        Compare the current macro table data to the committed data and create lists of the changed values necessary to update the table in the database to match the current values
